name: Shadow Skeleton
description: The Shadow Skeleton is a skeletal figure that glows faintly with a dark aura, able to move with surprising speed and agility in combat.
memorable: It can weaken its foes with debilitating shadowy auras while inflicting both slashing and necrotic damage.
goals: To eliminate living creatures and serve its dark master.
relations: Often encountered alongside other undead or creatures of darkness.
environment: Generally found in graveyards, ancient ruins, or shadowy plains.
strengths: High Dexterity enables effective evasion and swift attacks.
weaknesses: Requires living opponents to utilize its shadow aura effectively.
attacks: Two scimitar melee attacks that deal slashing damage, plus debilitating Finger Darts that inflict necrotic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Can envelop living foes in a shadowy aura that deals extra necrotic damage.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet, allowing it to navigate effectively in low light.
skills: Highly skilled in Dexterity-related tasks, especially stealth.
additional_information: Immune to poison damage and resistant to fire, piercing, and slashing damages.
Condition immunity to exhaustion and poisoned.
Commands tactical advantage through its combination of melee and ranged attacks.
Shadow aura can be extinguished through magical healing or specific intelligence checks.
test_queries: shadowy undead skeleton with quick attacks
undead creature that weakens foes with shadows
agile skeleton skilled in stealth and swift attacks
medium undead that attacks with necrotic power
skeleton that uses ranged finger darts
